photos.title: CAD Workshop Session
photos.description: Students actively participating in hands-on CAD training with industry-standard software. The workshop covered advanced 3D modeling techniques and design optimization strategies.

photos.description: Celebrating our talented students who won the annual mechanical design competition. Their innovative solutions impressed judges with creativity and technical excellence.

photos.description: Industry professionals sharing insights on future technology trends in mechanical engineering. Students gained valuable knowledge about career opportunities and emerging fields.
